text: CCSS.ELA-Literacy.L.4.3 Use knowledge of language and its conventions when writing, speaking, reading, or listening.

children.text: CCSS.ELA-Literacy.L.4.3.a Choose words and phrases to convey ideas precisely.*
CCSS.ELA-Literacy.L.4.3.c Differentiate between contexts that call for formal English (e.g., presenting ideas) and situations where informal discourse is appropriate (e.g., small-group discussion).
